name: Dracula
description: "Dracula Metaverse is a metaverse experience built on top of NFTWorlds, leveraging Minecraft 140M player base. The world will come with Play and Earn enabled, meaning that, by completing quests you will earn $WRLD and $DRC tokens. You will also be able to participate to weekly bounties, which are short lived in-game contest and events with up to 1000$ bounties for the winners. The game features proximity audio chat, meticulously crafted storyline, quests, powers, customized items, levels and factions."
